name: Fortune Finder (ATA_Games)
description:
Fortune, but at what cost? For treasure, the Fortune Finder will do anything, including the unthinkable. Dig up graves to find 3 keys and unlock your fortune. Play with a controller or keyboard.

This game was made for JamGoJam  | JamDNA 4.

Criteria #1: Nighttime - Nighttime was used to add atmosphere and increase the game's difficulty.

Criteria #2: Eerie - Digging up graves at night while avoiding an evil spirit.

Criteria #3: Ambient Piano - Warns the player if the evil spirit is nearby. Also adds to game's overall tone.

Criteria #4: Vibrant - Helps the player complete the game by pulsing to indicate nearby keys.
